primary.definition: ‘n Boek met praktiese inligting of instruksies
primary.example: Ek het 'n handboek gekoop om Afrikaans te leer.

secondary.definition: A book containing practical information or instructions
secondary.example: I bought a handbook to learn Afrikaans.

primary.definition: ‘n Groet wat blydskap oor iemand se aankoms uitdruk
primary.example: Welkom by ons huis!

secondary.definition: A greeting expressing pleasure at someone's arrival
secondary.example: Welcome to our home!

primary.definition: ‘n Uitdrukking van waardering of dankbaarheid
primary.example: Dankie vir jou hulp!

secondary.example: Thank you for your help!

primary.definition: ‘n Deursigtige vloeistof wat nodig is vir lewe
primary.example: Ek drink elke oggend ‘n glas water.

secondary.definition: A transparent liquid essential for life
secondary.example: I drink a glass of water every morning.

primary.definition: ‘n Versameling geskrewe of gedrukte bladsye
primary.example: Sy lees graag 'n boek voor slaaptyd.

secondary.definition: A collection of written or printed pages
secondary.example: She enjoys reading a book before bedtime.

primary.definition: Mense met wie jy ‘n hegte verhouding het
primary.example: Ek gaan saam met my vriende fliek toe.

secondary.definition: People with whom you have a close relationship
secondary.example: I'm going to the movies with my friends.

primary.definition: ‘n Plek waar mense woon
primary.example: Hulle bou ‘n nuwe huis in die dorp.

secondary.example: They are building a new house in town.

primary.definition: ‘n Instansie waar kinders leer
primary.example: Kinders gaan soggens skool toe.

secondary.definition: An institution where children are educated
secondary.example: Children go to school in the morning.

primary.definition: ‘n Meetbare periode waarin dinge gebeur
primary.example: Ek het nie genoeg tyd om alles te doen nie.

secondary.definition: A measurable period in which things happen
secondary.example: I don't have enough time to do everything.

primary.definition: Iets wat mense eet om energie te kry
primary.example: Die kos by die restaurant was heerlik.

secondary.definition: Something people eat to gain energy
secondary.example: The food at the restaurant was delicious.

primary.definition: ‘n Aktiwiteit wat moeite verg en dikwels ‘n inkomste bied
primary.example: Hy gaan elke dag werk toe.

secondary.definition: An activity involving effort, often for income
secondary.example: He goes to work every day.

primary.definition: ‘n Jong persoon wat nog nie volwasse is nie
primary.example: Die kind speel buite in die tuin.

secondary.definition: A young person who is not yet an adult
secondary.example: The child is playing outside in the garden.

primary.definition: Om met blydskap en klank te reageer op iets snaaks
primary.example: Ons het hard gelag vir die grap.

secondary.definition: To respond with joy and sound to something funny
secondary.example: We laughed hard at the joke.

primary.definition: Beskryf iemand wat baie moeite doen
primary.example: Sy is ‘n hardwerkende student.

secondary.definition: Describes someone who puts in a lot of effort
secondary.example: She is a hardworking student.

primary.definition: Wanneer jy nie meer energie het nie
primary.example: Ek is moeg na ‘n lang dag.

secondary.definition: When you have no more energy
secondary.example: I'm tired after a long day.

primary.definition: Om woorde op papier of ‘n skerm te verstaan
primary.example: Ek lees elke aand ‘n paar bladsye.

secondary.definition: To understand words on paper or a screen
secondary.example: I read a few pages every night.

primary.definition: Om gedagtes met woorde neer te pen
primary.example: Ek skryf ‘n brief aan my ouma.

secondary.example: I'm writing a letter to my grandmother.

primary.definition: ‘n Rolprent wat in ‘n teater vertoon word
primary.example: Ons kyk vanaand ‘n fliek.

secondary.definition: A film shown in a theater
secondary.example: We're watching a movie tonight.

primary.definition: Die huidige dag
primary.example: Vandag is ‘n mooi dag.

secondary.example: Today is a beautiful day.

primary.definition: Die dag voor vandag
primary.example: Gister was dit baie warm.

secondary.example: It was very hot yesterday.

primary.definition: Die dag ná vandag
primary.example: Môre gaan ons see toe.

secondary.example: We're going to the beach tomorrow.

primary.definition: Met ‘n groot lengte of duur
primary.example: Die tou was baie lank.

secondary.example: The queue was very long.

primary.definition: Met ‘n klein lengte of duur
primary.example: Die vergadering was kort.

secondary.example: The meeting was short.

primary.definition: Met ‘n hoë temperatuur
primary.example: Die somerdae is warm.

secondary.example: Summer days are hot.

primary.definition: Met ‘n lae temperatuur
primary.example: Die water is baie koud.

secondary.example: The water is very cold.

primary.definition: Vry van vuil of gemors
primary.example: Die kamer is baie skoon.

secondary.example: The room is very clean.

primary.definition: Nie skoon nie
primary.example: My skoene is vuil van die modder.

secondary.example: My shoes are dirty from the mud.

primary.definition: Om iets met woorde uit te druk
primary.example: Ek sê altyd die waarheid.

secondary.example: I need to say the words to learn them.

primary.definition: Om iemand by te staan met iets
primary.example: Ek help my ma met die skottelgoed.

secondary.example: I help my mom with the dishes.

primary.definition: Om visueel waar te neem
primary.example: Kom kyk na hierdie foto!

secondary.example: Come look at this photo!

primary.definition: Om te beweeg deur jou voete te gebruik
primary.example: Ek loop elke oggend in die park.

secondary.example: I walk in the park every morning.

primary.definition: Om vinnig te beweeg op jou voete
primary.example: Hy hardloop vinniger as ek.

secondary.definition: To move quickly on your feet
secondary.example: He runs faster than I do.

primary.definition: ‘n Voertuig met twee wiele
primary.example: Ek ry elke dag fiets skool toe.

secondary.example: I ride my bike to school every day.

primary.definition: ‘n Voertuig wat mense vervoer
primary.example: Ons ry met die motor na die winkels.

secondary.example: We drive to the shops by car.

primary.definition: ‘n Plek waar jy goed koop
primary.example: Ek koop brood by die winkel.

secondary.definition: A place where you buy things
secondary.example: I buy bread at the shop.

primary.definition: Wat jy gebruik om dinge te koop
primary.example: Ek het nie genoeg geld vir die kaartjie nie.

secondary.definition: What you use to buy things
secondary.example: I don't have enough money for the ticket.

primary.definition: Wat jy dra om jou lyf te bedek
primary.example: Sy koop nuwe klere vir die winter.

secondary.definition: What you wear to cover your body
secondary.example: She buys new clothes for winter.

primary.definition: Klanke en ritme wat mense geniet
primary.example: Ek luister graag na musiek.

secondary.definition: Sounds and rhythm that people enjoy
secondary.example: I like listening to music.

primary.definition: Beweeg jou lyf op die maat van musiek
primary.example: Ons dans op die partytjie.

secondary.definition: Move your body to the rhythm of music
secondary.example: We dance at the party.

primary.definition: Om musiek met jou stem te maak
primary.example: Sy sing in die koor.

secondary.definition: To make music with your voice
secondary.example: She sings in the choir.

primary.definition: ‘n Visuele eienskap soos rooi, blou of geel
primary.example: Watter kleur is jou rok?

secondary.definition: A visual property like red, blue or yellow
secondary.example: What colour is your dress?

primary.definition: Om deel te neem aan 'n aktiwiteit vir pret
primary.example: Die kinders speel in die tuin.

secondary.definition: To take part in an activity for fun
secondary.example: The children are playing in the garden.

primary.definition: Om woorde te gebruik om te kommunikeer
primary.example: Ons praat elke dag aan die telefoon.

secondary.example: We speak on the phone every day.

primary.definition: Om aandag te gee aan wat jy hoor
primary.example: Luister na wat ek sê.

secondary.definition: To pay attention to what you hear
secondary.example: Listen to what I'm saying.

primary.definition: Om in 'n toestand van rus te wees
primary.example: Ek slaap elke nag agt uur.

secondary.definition: To be in a state of rest
secondary.example: I sleep eight hours every night.

primary.definition: Om voedsel in te neem
primary.example: Ons eet saam by die tafel.

secondary.example: We eat together at the table.

primary.definition: Om vloeistof in te neem
primary.example: Ek drink water as ek dors is.

secondary.example: I drink water when I'm thirsty.

primary.definition: Om te leer vir 'n eksamen of om kennis op te doen
primary.example: Hy studeer elke aand vir sy eksamen.

secondary.definition: To learn for an exam or gain knowledge
secondary.example: He studies every evening for his exam.

primary.definition: Om iets te begryp of te weet wat iets beteken
primary.example: Ek verstaan nie wat jy sê nie.

secondary.definition: To comprehend or know what something means
secondary.example: I don't understand what you're saying.

primary.definition: Om gedagtes te hê of te oorweeg
primary.example: Ek dink aan my vakansie.

secondary.definition: To have thoughts or consider something
secondary.example: I'm thinking about my holiday.

primary.definition: Om kennis of inligting te hê
primary.example: Ek weet nie waar hy is nie.

secondary.example: I don't know where he is.

primary.definition: Om emosie of sensasie te ervaar
primary.example: Ek voel gelukkig vandag.

secondary.example: I feel happy today.

primary.definition: Om iets of iemand te geniet of lief te hê
primary.example: Ek hou van koffie.

secondary.definition: To enjoy or love something or someone
secondary.example: I like coffee.

primary.definition: Om iets te begeer of te wens
primary.example: Ek wil 'n nuwe kar koop.

secondary.definition: To desire or wish for something
secondary.example: I want to buy a new car.

primary.definition: Om die vermoë te hê om iets te doen
primary.example: Ek kan Afrikaans praat.

secondary.definition: To have the ability to do something
secondary.example: I can speak Afrikaans.

primary.definition: Om verplig te wees om iets te doen
primary.example: Ek moet my huiswerk doen.

secondary.definition: To be obliged to do something
secondary.example: I must do my homework.

primary.definition: Om van een plek na 'n ander te beweeg
primary.example: Ons gaan môre see toe.

secondary.definition: To move from one place to another
secondary.example: We're going to the beach tomorrow.

primary.definition: Om na 'n plek te beweeg
primary.example: Kom hier, ek wil jou iets wys.

secondary.example: Come here, I want to show you something.

primary.definition: Om jou liggaam te laat rus op 'n stoel of bank
primary.example: Sit asseblief, ek sal koffie maak.

secondary.definition: To rest your body on a chair or couch
secondary.example: Please sit, I'll make coffee.

primary.definition: Om op jou voete te wees
primary.example: Staan op en dans saam met ons.

secondary.example: Stand up and dance with us.

primary.definition: Om iets op te tel of te verhoog
primary.example: Lig asseblief die boks op.

secondary.definition: To pick up or raise something
secondary.example: Please lift the box.

primary.definition: Om iets te vat en te beweeg
primary.example: Ek dra die tassie vir jou.

secondary.example: I'll carry the bag for you.

primary.definition: Om iets na 'n plek te neem
primary.example: Bring asseblief die koerant.

secondary.definition: To take something to a place
secondary.example: Please bring the newspaper.

primary.definition: Om iets te vat of te gebruik
primary.example: Neem 'n koekie.

secondary.example: Take a cookie.

primary.definition: Om iets aan iemand te oorhandig
primary.example: Gee my die boek, asseblief.

secondary.example: Give me the book, please.

primary.definition: Om iets te ontdek of te kry
primary.example: Ek kan my sleutels nie vind nie.

secondary.example: I can't find my keys.

primary.definition: Om te probeer om iets te vind
primary.example: Ek soek na my bril.

secondary.example: I'm searching for my glasses.

primary.definition: Om nie meer te weet waar iets is nie
primary.example: Ek het my pen verloor.

secondary.definition: To no longer know where something is
secondary.example: I lost my pen.

primary.definition: Om iets te ontvang of te verkry
primary.example: Ek het 'n nuwe werk gekry.

secondary.example: I got a new job.

primary.definition: Om iets te skep of te vervaardig
primary.example: Ek maak koffie vir ons.

secondary.example: I'm making coffee for us.

primary.definition: Om 'n aksie uit te voer
primary.example: Wat doen jy vandag?

secondary.example: What are you doing today?

primary.definition: Om met 'n taak of proses 'n aanvang te neem.
primary.example: Ons begin môre met die projek.

secondary.example: We begin the project tomorrow.

primary.definition: Om iets te voltooi of te stop
primary.example: Die skool eindig om drie-uur.

secondary.example: School ends at three o'clock.

primary.definition: Om iets anders te maak
primary.example: Die weer het vinnig verander.

secondary.example: The weather changed quickly.

primary.definition: Om inligting of iets te begeer
primary.example: Ek wil jou iets vra.

secondary.example: I want to ask you something.

primary.definition: Om te reageer op 'n vraag
primary.example: Antwoord asseblief die telefoon.

secondary.example: Please answer the phone.

primary.definition: Om iets aan iemand te demonstreer
primary.example: Wys my hoe om dit te doen.

secondary.example: Show me how to do it.

primary.definition: Om kennis of vaardighede op te doen
primary.example: Ek leer Afrikaans.

secondary.example: I'm learning Afrikaans.

primary.definition: Om iemand te help om te leer
primary.example: Sy onderrig wiskunde op skool.

secondary.example: She teaches mathematics at school.

primary.definition: Om iets te konstruksieer
primary.example: Hulle bou 'n nuwe huis.

secondary.example: They're building a new house.

primary.definition: Om iets in stukke te maak
primary.example: Moenie die glas breek nie.

secondary.example: Don't break the glass.

primary.definition: Om iets wat gebreek is reg te maak
primary.example: Hy herstel motors vir 'n lewe.

secondary.definition: To fix something that is broken
secondary.example: He repairs cars for a living.

primary.definition: Om iets skoon te maak met water
primary.example: Ek was my hande voor ete.

secondary.example: I wash my hands before eating.

primary.definition: Om water van iets te verwyder
primary.example: Droog jou hande af.

secondary.example: Dry your hands.

primary.definition: Om voedsel te berei met hitte
primary.example: Sy kook elke aand vir die gesin.

secondary.example: She cooks for the family every evening.

primary.definition: Om voedsel in 'n oond te berei
primary.example: Ek bak 'n koek vir die partytjie.

secondary.definition: To prepare food in an oven
secondary.example: I'm baking a cake for the party.

primary.definition: Om vleis op 'n vuur gaar te maak
primary.example: Ons gaan nou braai!

secondary.definition: To grill meat on a fire
secondary.example: We're having a barbecue tomorrow.

primary.definition: Om 'n voertuig te bestuur
primary.example: Ek ry elke dag werk toe.

secondary.example: I drive to work every day.

primary.definition: Om 'n voertuig te stop en te laat staan
primary.example: Parkeer die kar in die garage.

secondary.definition: To stop and leave a vehicle
secondary.example: Park the car in the garage.

primary.definition: Om deur die lug te beweeg
primary.example: Die voëls vlieg in die lug.

secondary.example: The birds are flying in the sky.

primary.definition: Om in water te beweeg
primary.example: Die kinders swem in die swembad.

secondary.example: The children are swimming in the pool.

primary.definition: Om op te beweeg en weer af te kom
primary.example: Die paddas spring in die water.

secondary.definition: To move up and come down again
secondary.example: The frogs are jumping into the water.

primary.definition: Om met jou oë waar te neem
primary.example: Ek sien jou môre.

secondary.example: I'll see you tomorrow.

primary.definition: Om met jou neus waar te neem
primary.example: Ruik aan hierdie pragtige blomme.

secondary.example: Smell these beautiful flowers.

primary.definition: Om met jou tong waar te neem
primary.example: Proe hierdie heerlike koek.

secondary.example: Taste this delicious cake.

primary.definition: Om fisiese kontak met iets te maak, gewoonlik met die hande.
primary.example: Raak nie aan die warm stoof nie.

secondary.example: Don't touch the hot stove.

primary.definition: Om met jou ore waar te neem
primary.example: Ek hoor die voëls sing.

secondary.example: I hear the birds singing.

primary.definition: Om 'n storie of inligting te deel
primary.example: Vertel my van jou dag.

secondary.definition: To share a story or information
secondary.example: Tell me about your day.

primary.definition: Om trane te laat wanneer jy hartseer is
primary.example: Die baba huil omdat hy honger is.

secondary.example: The baby is crying because he's hungry.

primary.definition: Om jou mond te beweeg om blydskap te wys
primary.example: Sy glimlag vir die kamera.

secondary.definition: To move your mouth to show happiness
secondary.example: She smiles for the camera.

primary.definition: Om een oog te sluit as 'n teken
primary.example: Hy knipoog vir my oor die kamer.

secondary.definition: To close one eye as a sign
secondary.example: He winks at me across the room.

primary.definition: Om 'n teken van verwelkoming of erkenning aan iemand te gee.
primary.example: Groet jou ma vir my.

secondary.example: Greet your mother for me.

primary.definition: Betreffende 'n onderwerp; of in die rondte.
primary.example: Ons praat oor die naweek se planne.

secondary.example: We are talking about the weekend's plans.

primary.definition: In 'n tyd wat volg op 'n gebeurtenis.
primary.example: Ons eet na die vergadering.

secondary.definition: In a time following an event.
secondary.example: We will eat after the meeting.

primary.definition: Nog 'n keer; opnuut.
primary.example: Kan jy dit asseblief weer sê?

secondary.example: Can you please say that again?

primary.definition: Die hele hoeveelheid; elke een.
primary.example: Almal is genooi na die partytjie.

secondary.example: All are invited to the party.

primary.definition: Daarbenewens; verder.
primary.example: Ek hou van tee, en ek hou ook van koffie.

secondary.example: I like tea, and I also like coffee.

primary.definition: Op elke geleentheid; voortdurend.
primary.example: Die son kom altyd in die ooste op.

secondary.example: The sun always rises in the east.

primary.definition: 'n Voegwoord wat items in 'n lys verbind.
primary.example: Ek het appels en piesangs gekoop.

secondary.definition: A conjunction connecting items in a list.
secondary.example: I bought apples and bananas.

primary.definition: Maak nie saak watter een nie; een of 'n paar.
primary.example: Jy kan enige boek kies wat jy wil lees.

secondary.definition: No matter which one; one or some.
secondary.example: You can choose any book you want to read.

primary.definition: Vir die rede dat; aangesien.
primary.example: Ek is laat omdat die verkeer sleg was.

secondary.example: I am late because the traffic was bad.

primary.definition: Vroeër as 'n spesifieke tyd of gebeurtenis.
primary.example: Borsel jou tande voor jy gaan slaap.

secondary.definition: Earlier than a particular time or event.
secondary.example: Brush your teeth before you go to bed.

primary.definition: Van aansienlike omvang of dimensie.
primary.example: Daar is 'n groot boom in die tuin.

secondary.example: There is a big tree in the garden.

primary.definition: 'n Voegwoord wat 'n kontras aandui.
primary.example: Dit is sonnig, maar koud.

secondary.example: It is sunny but cold.

primary.definition: Dui die agent of middel van 'n aksie aan.
primary.example: Die boek is deur my vriend geskryf.

secondary.definition: Indicating the agent or means of an action.
secondary.example: The book was written by my friend.

primary.definition: 'n Periode van vier-en-twintig uur.
primary.example: Vandag is 'n pragtige dag.

secondary.example: Today is a beautiful day.

primary.definition: Word gebruik om iets onverwags of verrassends te beklemtoon.
primary.example: Selfs die kat het bang gelyk.

secondary.definition: Used to emphasize something unexpected or surprising.
secondary.example: Even the cat looked scared.

primary.definition: Verwys na al die lede van 'n groep sonder uitsondering.
primary.example: Elke student het 'n boek ontvang.

secondary.definition: Referring to all members of a group without exception.
secondary.example: Every student received a book.

primary.definition: Kom voor alle ander in tyd of volgorde.
primary.example: Dit is my eerste keer hier.

secondary.definition: Coming before all others in time or order.
secondary.example: This is my first time here.

primary.definition: Dui die ontvanger of doel van iets aan.
primary.example: Hierdie geskenk is vir jou.

secondary.definition: Indicating the recipient or purpose of something.
secondary.example: This gift is for you.

primary.definition: Dui die oorsprong of bron van iets aan.
primary.example: Ek kom van Suid-Afrika.

secondary.definition: Indicating the origin or source of something.
secondary.example: I come from South Africa.

primary.definition: Van 'n hoë standaard of kwaliteit.
primary.example: Dit is 'n goeie boek.

secondary.definition: Of a high standard or quality.
secondary.example: This is a good book.

primary.definition: Van merkwaardige kwaliteit; baie goed.
primary.example: Die kos was uitstekend.

secondary.example: The food was great.

primary.definition: Om te besit, te hou of te ervaar.
primary.example: Ek het 'n kat.

secondary.example: I have a cat.

primary.definition: Op hierdie plek; na hierdie plek.
primary.example: Kom sit hier by my.

secondary.definition: In this place; to this place.
secondary.example: Come sit here by me.

primary.definition: Op watter manier of wyse.
primary.example: Hoe gaan dit met jou?

secondary.example: How are you doing?

primary.definition: 'n Voegwoord wat 'n voorwaarde stel.
primary.example: As dit reën, bly ons binne.

secondary.example: If it rains, we will stay inside.

primary.definition: Dui 'n posisie binne perke aan.
primary.example: Die sleutels is in die laai.

secondary.example: The keys are in the drawer.

primary.definition: Slegs; alleenlik; onlangs.
primary.example: Ek het net vyf minute nodig.

secondary.example: I just need five minutes.

primary.definition: Kom aan die einde; die mees onlangse.
primary.example: Dit is die laaste bladsy van die boek.

secondary.definition: Coming at the end; the most recent.
secondary.example: This is the last page of the book.

primary.definition: Van geringe grootte.
primary.example: Dit is 'n klein hondjie.

secondary.example: It is a little puppy.

primary.definition: 'n Volwasse manlike mens.
primary.example: Die man dra 'n hoed.

secondary.example: The man is wearing a hat.

primary.definition: 'n Groot aantal of hoeveelheid.
primary.example: Daar is baie mense hier.

secondary.example: There are many people here.

primary.definition: 'n Groter of bykomende hoeveelheid.
primary.example: Ek wil meer water hê, asseblief.

secondary.example: I want more water, please.

primary.definition: Die grootste hoeveelheid of getal.
primary.example: Die meeste mense hou van sjokolade.

secondary.example: Most people like chocolate.

primary.definition: 'n Groot hoeveelheid of mate.
primary.example: Dankie vir jou heelwat hulp.

secondary.example: Thank you very much for your help.

primary.definition: 'n Woord of stel woorde waardeur 'n persoon of ding bekend is.
primary.example: Wat is jou naam?

secondary.definition: A word or set of words by which a person or thing is known.
secondary.example: What is your name?

primary.definition: Op geen tydstip nie; nie ooit nie.
primary.example: Ek sal dit nooit vergeet nie.

secondary.example: I will never forget this.

primary.definition: Nie voorheen bestaande nie; onlangs gemaak.
primary.example: Ek het 'n nuwe rok gekoop.

secondary.example: I bought a new dress.

primary.definition: 'n Negatiewe antwoord of ontkenning.
primary.example: Nee, dankie, ek is nie honger nie.

secondary.example: No, thank you, I am not hungry.

primary.definition: Op die huidige oomblik.
primary.example: Ons moet nou gaan.

secondary.example: We must go now.

primary.definition: Dui besitting of deel van 'n geheel aan.
primary.example: Die kleur van die motor is rooi.

secondary.definition: Expressing possession or belonging to a whole.
secondary.example: The colour of the car is red.

primary.definition: Het vir 'n lang tyd geleef of bestaan.
primary.example: My oupa is baie oud.

secondary.definition: Having lived or existed for a long time.
secondary.example: My grandfather is very old.

primary.definition: Dui 'n posisie bo-op iets aan.
primary.example: Die boek is op die tafel.

secondary.definition: Expressing a position on top of something.
secondary.example: The book is on the table.

primary.definition: En niemand of niks anders nie; nie meer as nie.
primary.example: Ek het slegs een appel oor.

secondary.definition: And no one or nothing more besides; not more than.
secondary.example: I only have one apple left.

primary.definition: 'n Voegwoord wat 'n alternatief bied.
primary.example: Wil jy tee of koffie hê?

secondary.example: Would you like tea or coffee?

primary.definition: Verskillend van die een wat reeds genoem is.
primary.example: Ek wil die ander hemp probeer.

secondary.example: I want to try the other shirt.

primary.definition: Weg van die binnekant; na buite.
primary.example: Die kat het by die deur uitgeloop.

secondary.example: The cat walked out the door.

primary.definition: In 'n posisie hoër as, of wat iets bedek.
primary.example: Die vliegtuig het bo-oor die stad gevlieg.

secondary.definition: In a position higher than, or covering something.
secondary.example: The plane flew over the city.

primary.definition: Menslike wesens in die algemeen.
primary.example: Daar is baie mense in die park.

secondary.example: There are many people in the park.

primary.definition: 'n Spesifieke posisie, punt of area.

secondary.definition: A particular position, point, or area.
secondary.example: This is a nice place for a picnic.
